=== Bio ===

Brazilian Paulistano, Married, and for those who like astrology, I am the sign of Scorpio. Working as Operator of Conditional Access System (CAS) - Digital TV, and have training in middle level technician Computer Technician at Centro Paula Souza - ETEC Uirapuru. Consider myself a Free Software enthusiast and a listener of the radio waves (SWL), whether they shortwave (SW), medium (MW) and Long (LW), preference for listening to Air band.<<BR>>

Met and started using Ubuntu version 5.04 (Hoary Hedghog). Spent by Debian several times and got to "prove" CentOS, Fedora and Opensuse, however, after 2 days of use on each, I went back to Ubuntu as a sorry dog.<<BR>>

Currently, I have been studying to take the exam of '''LPIC-01'''.
